name: videoSourceSetVideoProfile
description:
Sets the video profile for videoSource.Deprecated:
                    Please use the videoSourceSetVideoEncoderConfiguration method instead.
                
            
            A method for the second instance.
            Call this method before calling videoSourceStartScreenCaptureByScreen or videoSourceStartScreenCaptureByWindow.

parameters.swapWidthAndHeight:
The SDK outputs video with a fixed width and height according to the video profile (profile) you selected. This parameter sets whether to swap width and height of the video:
  
      true: Swap the width and height.
      false: (Default) Do not swap the width and height.
